Package Brick.Break.Wall

Class WallController

java.lang.Object
Brick.Break.Wall.WallController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Move
public class WallController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Move
This is the Controller of Model class(Wall Class) in Wall MVC design pattern This class implement the methods from "Move" interface class.

  • Field Details

    • wallModel

      private Wall wallModel

  • Constructor Details

    • WallController

      public WallController​(Wall wallModel)
      This is the constructor of "WallController" class. This constructor will set the default value for the data in model class(wall class) once it is called by another class. this constructor set the starting speed of the ball. In the original code, the starting speed of the ball is set to random everytime the player open the game. I changed the starting speed of the ball to a fixed value which is (3, 3).
      Parameters:
      wallModel - This parameter is the object of model class(Wall class).

  • Method Details

    • makeBall

      public void makeBall​(java.awt.geom.Point2D ballPos)
      This method create the rubber ball.
      Parameters:
      ballPos - The position of the ball.

    • move

      public void move()
      This method move the ball automatically when the game start. This method comes from "Move" interface class and is implemented here.
      Specified by:
      move in interface Move

    • findImpacts

      public void findImpacts()
      This method checks where the ball hit in the game and determined what the game should do after the impact from the ball. If the ball hit the rectangle(Player), the ball will bounce off the rectangle and back to the top. If it hit the bottom of the border, the ball will reappear on the rectangle and the ball count will be deducted by 1. If it hit the sides of the border, the ball will bounce from it.

    • impactWall

      public boolean impactWall()
      This method checks if the ball hit the bottom of the border of the game.
      Returns:
      "true" or "false"

    • impactBorder

      public boolean impactBorder()
      This method check if the ball hit the left and right side of the border.
      Returns:
      "true" or "false"

    • ballReset

      public void ballReset()
      This method reset the ball to it original amount and reset the ball speed to (3, -3). In the original code, the reset ball speed is randomize. I changed the reset to a fix value which is (3, 13).

    • wallReset

      public void wallReset()
      This method reset the ball amount to 3 and make all the broken bricks reappear in the game.

    • setBallXSpeed

      public void setBallXSpeed​(int s)
      This is a setter method which set the ball X speed from the model class(Wall class).
